#include<stdio.h>
#include<iomanip>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	double c;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		    scanf("%d",&n);
		    if(n<=100)
		    printf("0.000000\n");
		    else
			{
			n-=100;
			double ans=0.1*double(n)/20.0;
		    printf("%0.7lf\n",ans);
		    }
	}
}
